function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reducing class duration may result in a reduction of 49.6% in the number of infected people with COVID-19.","Impact":"Lower risk of COVID-19 transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing virtual education as part of the class duration.","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, video conferencing tools.","People":"Occupants, students, faculty, staff.","Owner":"University administration."},{"Description":"Reducing class duration results in a 28% and 28.6% reduction in energy consumption in winter and summer, respectively.","Impact":"Lower energy consumption.","Mitigation":"Allocating a part of class duration to virtual education.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, smart building technologies.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers.","Owner":"University administration."},{"Description":"The study identifies the impact of occupants, air exchange rate, class duration, and working hours on energy consumption and COVID-19 infection risk.","Impact":"Identifies dominant parameters affecting COVID-19 transmission and energy consumption.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control and optimize these parameters.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality monitoring systems.","People":"Facility managers, building occupants, university administration.","Owner":"Facility managers, university administration."}]}
